Masithi isantya esiphakathi sesiqingatha sakhe, esingama-50 mph, kwaye siqwalasele ukuba uqhuba iiyure ezi-4. Ukuba siqala nge-50 mph, masibale isantya ngemizuzu nganye:

2. Isantya ngemizuzu yesibini, emva kokunciphisa isantya siye kuma-30 mph, siba yi-30 mph x 60 / 3600 = 0.167 ft/s.
3. Isantya ngemizuzu yesithathu, xa sele uqhuba ngama-80 mph, siba yi-80 mph x 60 / 3600 = 0.222 ft/s.
4. Ukubala umgama, sisebenzisa ifomula: Umgama = (0.139 ft/s + 0.167 ft/s + 0.222 ft/s) x 4 = 40.84 feet.

Ukuba ufuna ukwazi ukuba ukude kangakanani ekhaya ekupheleni kweeyure ezi-4, kufuneka wazi ukuba umgama ngamnye uqala ukubalwa ngokwahlukileyo ngokwexesha.
